scripts.start: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ADMIN,CARDS,COLOR,MATCH,PUZZLE" --prefix-colors "blue.bold,green.bold,red.bold,yellow.bold,magenta.bold,cyan.bold,white.bold" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:wondercards" "npm run start:wondercolor" "npm run start:wondermatch" "npm run start:wonderpuz"
scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ADMIN,CARDS,COLOR,MATCH,PUZZLE" --prefix-colors "blue.bold,green.bold,red.bold,yellow.bold,magenta.bold,cyan.bold,white.bold" "npm run install:backend" "npm run install:frontend" "npm run install:admin" "npm run install:wondercards" "npm run install:wondercolor" "npm run install:wondermatch" "npm run install:wonderpuz"
